Football: UEFA Conference League - match: Jagiellonia Białystok - Rayo Vallecano
UEFA Europa League Archive
programme.sub-title: Odense - Wisła Kraków 01.12.2011 - sezon 2011/2012
programme.desc: In the program, viewers will see fragments of memorable matches played in the UEFA Europa League.From the 2009/2010 season, this competition replaced the previous UEFA Cup.The authors pay special attention to matches involving Polish clubs.The first Polish team to win the right to play in the LE group stage was Lech Poznań, later Wisła Kraków and Legia Warszawa also achieved this feat.The greatest success so far was promotion to the 1/16 finals of Lech in the 2010/2011 season, Legia and Wisła in the 2011/2012 season and Legia Warszawa in the 2014/2015 season.

programme.title: Football: UEFA Conference League - match: RC Strasbourg - Crystal Palace FC
UEFA Europa League Archive
programme.sub-title: Lech Poznań - Juventus Turyn 01.12.2010 - sezon 2010/2011
programme.desc: In the program, viewers will see fragments of memorable matches played in the UEFA Europa League.From the 2009/2010 season, this competition replaced the previous UEFA Cup.The authors pay special attention to matches involving Polish clubs.The first Polish team to win the right to play in the LE group stage was Lech Poznań, later Wisła Kraków and Legia Warszawa also achieved this feat.The greatest success so far was promotion to the 1/16 finals of Lech in the 2010/2011 season, Legia and Wisła in the 2011/2012 season and Legia Warszawa in the 2014/2015 season.

programme.desc: Match highlights, as well as goals and interesting situations that took place in the last round of the Europa League.

Football: Coppa Italia - quarter-final match: Inter Milan - Torino FC
Football: UEFA Conference League - match: Legia Warszawa - Lincoln Red Imps FC
Football: UEFA Conference League - match: Jagiellonia Białystok - KuPS Kuopio
programme.desc: At the halfway point of the regular phase of the Conference League, Pride of Podlasie is in thirteenth place, which guarantees seeding in the play-off phase.Adrian Siemieniec's players remain undefeated, but they cannot be proud of their last performance.They only drew 1-1 with Macedonian Shkendija and scored the equalizing goal in the tenth minute of added time.Jagiellonia has a match against KuPS Kuopio, which, like itself, has five points.The Finnish team will take to the field in Białystok encouraged by their 3-1 victory over Slovan Bratislava in the previous round.

programme.title: Football: UEFA Conference League - match: FC Noah - Legia Warszawa
Football: UEFA Conference League - match: SK Sigma Olomouc - Lech Poznań
Football: UEFA Conference League - match: Omonia FC - Raków Częstochowa
programme.desc: The Medals are one of three teams in the Conference League that have not yet been defeated in the regular round.The Częstochowa team has already secured their place in the knockout phase, but they do not intend to be satisfied with that.They are counting on direct promotion to the 1/8 finals, which will give them a place in the best eight at the end of the league phase.Before the clash with Omonia, coached by former Legia coach Henning Berg, they are in third place in the table.The team from Nicosia is fifteenth and has eight points, three less than Raków.

programme.title: Football: UEFA Conference League - match: Jagiellonia Białystok - KuPS Kuopio
programme.desc: At the halfway point of the regular phase of the Conference League, Pride of Podlasie is in thirteenth place, which guarantees seeding in the play-off phase.Adrian Siemieniec's players remain undefeated, but they cannot be proud of their last performance.They only drew 1-1 with Macedonian Shkendija and scored the equalizing goal in the tenth minute of added time.Jagiellonia has a match against KuPS Kuopio, which, like itself, has five points.The Finnish team will take to the field in Białystok encouraged by their 3-1 victory over Slovan Bratislava in the previous round.

Women's football: English League - match: Manchester City FC - Chelsea FC
programme.desc: The match at the top of the English women's league.Manchester City's players are the leaders with twelve wins and only one defeat.In the last series of matches they defeated London City Lionesses 2:1.Chelsea is placed lower, nine points behind the Citizens.The team from London made their fight for the championship more difficult with a 0-2 defeat against Arsenal in the previous round.However, Chelsea will enter the next match encouraged by their 1-0 victory over Manchester City in the semi-final of the domestic cup.

programme.title: Women's football: English League - match: Manchester City FC - Chelsea FC
programme.desc: The match at the top of the English women's league.Manchester City's players are the leaders with twelve wins and only one defeat.In the last series of matches they defeated London City Lionesses 2:1.Chelsea is placed lower, nine points behind the Citizens.The team from London made their fight for the championship more difficult with a 0-2 defeat against Arsenal in the previous round.However, Chelsea will enter the next match encouraged by their 1-0 victory over Manchester City in the semi-final of the domestic cup.

American football: NFL - Super Bowl: Seattle Seahawks - New England Patriots
programme.desc: The 60th edition of the Super Bowl, the NFL championship match between the champion of the American Football Conference (AFC) and the best team in the National Football Conference (NFC).The New England Patriots have a chance to achieve a historic seventh victory in this competition.Just like in 2015, their opponent in the final will be the Seattle Seahawks, who have won the Vince Lombardi Trophy only once so far.The arena for the match will be Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, which will host the NFL Finals for the second time.

Combat sports: KSW 63 - fight: Roberto Soldić - Patrik Kincl 04/09/2021
programme.desc: At the end of the event in the ATM Studio in Warsaw, Roberto Soldić will defend his welterweight title again.Fans are wondering whether Robocop will end the fight with a knockout again, as he did in five of the six winning fights in KSW.However, the Croatian representative faces a very difficult task.Patrik Kincl will enter the cage with a series of five victories in his fights.The confrontation between these outstanding players was to take place during KSW 50 in London.Ultimately, they will meet almost two years later in Warsaw.
